about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 166: Heroic Characters 33

Another hoard of Heroes heed your call! Not to be outdone by the Heroic characters of the 32nd pack, the 33rd arrives in force, with a fearsome phalanx of mixed race heroes. Tenacious Tiefling fighters, Gallant Gnome wizards, and Elegant Elvish rogues, fill a full roster of 31 tokens of both genders, and multiple non-human races!
  • Tiefling Warlock
  • Tiefling Slicer
  • Tiefling Happy Bard
  • Tiefling Bard
  • Tiefling Bard tux
  • Tiefling Barbarian
  • Tiefling Barbarian P
  • Thiefling Vagabond
  • Thiefling Fighter2
  • Thiefling Fighter
  • Tabaxi Paladin
  • Tabaxi hunter
  • Halfling Charmer
  • HalfGiant Fighter
  • Half Elf Paladin
  • Half-ElTactician2
  • HalhalOrc2
  • Half Orc
  • Goliath Destroyer
  • Gnome Wizard3
  • Gnome Wizard2
  • Genasi WaveSurfer
  • Genasi Fire Wizard
  • Elven Wizard
  • Elf Wizard electric
  • Elf Rogue fighter2
  • Elf Rogue fighter
  • Elf Pirate Rogue
  • Elf Paladin
  • Elf Monk
  • Elf Fighter2
"
